verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Beacuse Quraish was made to incline.
verse.verse_2: He made them incline in their journeys of winter and summer both.
verse.verse_3: They should therefore worship the Lord of this House.
verse.verse_4: Who gave them food in lunger, and bestowed them security from a big fear.
